subject: ENGLISH
text: Write a composition of about three foolscap pages in length on any one of the following subjects:

subject: ENGLISH
text: A description of a visit paid to one of the following: a circus; a bird sanctuary; a ceilidh; highland games; an agricultural show; a pageant; a regatta; the launching of a ship.

subject: ENGLISH
text: Suppose that you have been asked to address an adult society in your neighbourhood on “My School.” Write your speech.

subject: ENGLISH
text: Imagine that at the end of your school career you win a prize which is intended to enable you to visit a foreign country. What country would you choose to visit, and why?

subject: ENGLISH
text: What would you like, and what would you dislike, in the life of one of the following: an errand boy; a village policeman; a school secretary; a shepherd; a fisherman; a clerk in an office or bank; a shop girl; a worker in a garage; a factory employee.
